subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etyl}}
{{liushu|p}} – Picture of a tool - a carving knife or a chisel - used to mark slaves and criminals.

subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text:
From {{inh|zh|sit-pro|*m-sin||liver; heart; bile; bitter}}.

; symplectic
: From {{bor|zh|en|symplectic}}.
